column4: hello i have ubuntu with gnome desktop !! and adsl connection i have pppoeconf packages its work good but i search another package like pppoeconf with GUI ???????????
i have ubuntu with gnome desktop and now i install kde (apt-get install kubuntu-desktop) how i chose between kde and gnome when i restart the pc ???
in your login screen there should be sessions button it should let u choose which session u want to boot into
